messages.messageBody:

> Special thanks to Heather for pointing me towards Jane Goodall's Roots
> and
> Shoots Clubs...I LOVE the sound of this one and think it'll be perfect
> for our
> community! I've already joined and expect to get a packet brimming
> with ideas
> and suggestions for getting started soon!

"Young Peacemakers" is another organization you might want to look into.

-pam

National Home Education Network
<www.NHEN.org>
Serving the entire homeschooling community since 1999
through information, networking and public relations.

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Youth Group for unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks to those of you who responded to my query.  I guess you re right that if you don t participate in a national level, you can belong to any of the
messages.messageBody:
Thanks to those of you who responded to my query. I guess you're right that
if you don't participate in a national level, you can belong to any of the
organizations and decide to keep things loose and unstructured as you want :)

Special thanks to Heather for pointing me towards Jane Goodall's Roots and
Shoots Clubs...I LOVE the sound of this one and think it'll be perfect for our
community! I've already joined and expect to get a packet brimming with ideas
and suggestions for getting started soon!

Warmly,
Denise


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
